title: Assistant won't play songs from my google play music library
content: Everytime I use my google assistant to shuffle the music in my google play music library it will automatically just shuffle any song from Google Play music. I have play music set as my default and everytime I use commands like "shuffle music in my library" or "play ___ from my library" it still just shuffles generic music from the app and not what I have saved. Does anyone know the command to get it to play my music ?!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
